title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 201.10 - Community or public mausoleums and columbariums
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 201.10 - Community or public mausoleums and columbariums

State Regulations
A cemetery may not sell or assign burial rights, crypts or
niches to a person or persons who will not use these plots or crypts directly. A group of persons not related by family ties may not purchase land from the
cemetery for the purpose of erecting a public mausoleum or columbarium under
contract with an operator. Only a cemetery may undertake to construct and own a
public mausoleum or columbarium. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
